org.hbase.async
Class ValueFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.hbase.async.ScanFilter
      org.hbase.async.CompareFilter
          org.hbase.async.ValueFilter

public final class ValueFilter
extends CompareFilter

Filter key values based on their value. Takes an operator (equal, greater, not equal, etc). and a filter comparator.

Since:
1.6
